item.title: Markdown Features
item.description: This is a quick demonstration post. It serves as an example of the features of this theme. FormattingBlockquotesSome blockquotes. But first, we try to manually cite via This is between cite tags and has math: \(e^x \) This is a blockquote with two paragraphs, that employs the markdowns > blockquoting. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aliquam hendrerit mi posuere lectus. Vestibulum enim wisi, viverra nec, fringilla in, laoreet vitae, risus.
